verses.text: \w Let|strong="G5293"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* be subject \w unto|strong="G5293"\w* the \w higher|strong="G5242"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: the \w powers|strong="G1849"\w* that \w be|strong="G5607"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w ordained|strong="G5021"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="G0498"\w* \w therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w resisteth|strong="G0498"\w* the \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w resisteth|strong="G0436"\w* the \w ordinance|strong="G1296"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* they that \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* to \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w damnation|strong="G2917"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w terror|strong="G5401"\w* \w to|strong="G2041"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to the \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*. Wilt \w thou|strong="G2309"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be afraid \w of|strong="G5399"\w* the \w power|strong="G1849"\w*? \w do|strong="G4160"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w do|strong="G4160"\w* that which is \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, be \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w beareth|strong="G5409"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* in \w vain|strong="G1500"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, a \w revenger|strong="G1558"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \add execute\add* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* upon him that \w doeth|strong="G4238"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \add ye\add* must \w needs|strong="G0318"\w* be \w subject|strong="G5293"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* conscience \w sake|strong="G4893"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5124"\w* pay \w ye|strong="G5055"\w* \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w Godâ€™s|strong="G2316"\w* \w ministers|strong="G3011"\w*, attending \w continually|strong="G4342"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* very \w thing|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Render|strong="G0591"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* their \w dues|strong="G3782"\w*: \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* \add is due\add*; \w custom|strong="G5056"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w custom|strong="G5056"\w*; \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*; \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*.

\w Owe|strong="G3784"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* any \w thing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* to \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he that \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* hath \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G3431"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* commit \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G5407"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w kill|strong="G5407"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G2813"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G5576"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* bear false \w witness|strong="G5576"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G1937"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w covet|strong="G1937"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \add there be\add* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, it is briefly \w comprehended|strong="G0346"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w namely|strong="G1722"\w*, Thou shalt \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w thyself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Love|strong="G0026"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2038"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w ill|strong="G2556"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w*: \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \add is\add* the \w fulfilling|strong="G4138"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \add it is\add* high \w time|strong="G5610"\w* to \w awake|strong="G1453"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \add is\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w nearer|strong="G1452"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* we \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.

The \w night|strong="G3571"\w* is far \w spent|strong="G4298"\w*, the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* is at \w hand|strong="G1448"\w*: let \w us|strong="G0659"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* cast \w off|strong="G0659"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* let us put \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the \w armour|strong="G3696"\w* of \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

Let us \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w honestly|strong="G2156"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* in \w rioting|strong="G2970"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drunkenness|strong="G3178"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* in \w chambering|strong="G2845"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wantonness|strong="G0766"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* in \w strife|strong="G2054"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w envying|strong="G2205"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* put ye \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w provision|strong="G4307"\w* for the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \add fulfil\add* the \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* \add thereof.\add*
